JOWAR.fertilizer_needs: Medium N, Low P, Low K
JOWAR.general_notes: Sorghum. Dual purpose (grain/fodder). Tolerant to drought and moderate salinity.

MAIZE.fertilizer_needs: Very High N, High P, Medium K, Zinc
MAIZE.general_notes: Sensitive to waterlogging, especially early. Critical water need at tasseling/silking. Rabi version often higher yield.

MANGO.fertilizer_needs: Medium NPK during bearing, High Organic Matter
MANGO.general_notes: Perennial fruit tree. Requires distinct dry period for flowering. Sensitive to frost and waterlogging.

ONION.fertilizer_needs: Medium N, High P, High K, Sulphur essential
ONION.general_notes: Sensitive to day length for bulbing. Requires good drainage.

POTATO.fertilizer_needs: Very High NPK, High Organic Matter, Calcium, Magnesium
POTATO.general_notes: Requires quality seed tubers. Sensitive to frost and high temperatures during tuberization.

RICE.fertilizer_needs: High N, Medium P, Medium K, Zinc essential
RICE.general_notes: Paddy. Requires puddling and standing water for optimal growth. Sensitive to salinity.

WHEAT.fertilizer_needs: High N, Medium P, Low-Medium K, Sulphur often needed
WHEAT.general_notes: Rabi crop. Cool weather needed for germination/tillering. Heat sensitive during grain filling.
